title: Best of The Herd for May 01, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for May 01, 2020
description:
The Packers and Matt LaFluer don't like how Aaron runs the Packers offense 

The SEC might decide to play football on its own this fall

Adam Silver has the roughest job of any sports commissioner this summer 

AFC Over/Under win totals 

Which QBs would fit better in different cities


Guest: Andrew Whitworth, Rams Left Tackle

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
